thread.title: Phillip Wyrick

author: Phillip Wyrick
title: Phillip Wyrick
text: I was kind of skeptical at first,who wouldn't be? Sending your gift cards in and hoping you get your money. This company is legit and everything went as there website said. They paid the shipping I shipped my cards and had my check within 3 days of them receiving it. They offered the most by far to compared to other companies I searched. Thanks card kangaroo !!! Well definitely spread the word about y'all
